scripts.dev: watchify -vd -p browserify-hmr -t vueify -e src/main.js -o build/build.js & http-server -c 1 -a localhost
scripts.start: watchify -vd -p browserify-hmr -t vueify -e src/main.js -o build/build.js & http-server -c 1 -a localhost
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/watchify/node_modules/.bin/browserify -t vueify -e src/main.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > build/build.js
